item.title: Level Restoring
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

making you one…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2009, 11:57:59 am[/size][hr]k, search for;

public void UpdateNPCChat() {

Scroll all the way down till you see the last case:

and then add this in, and change all the numbers, the npcid, nad the case number, to what it should be… for example if the last one was 150, make the next one 151, then 152… ect…

case #: talk("Hello "+ playerName+" would you like to restore your defence?",NPCID); break; case #: choice("Yes Please!", "No!"); break; case #: talk("Are you sure? its no way to get back...", NPCID); break; case #: choice("Yes", "No"); break; case #: talk("Ok your Defence is now 1 again!", NPCID); break;

tell me the npc id, and ill help you with the next part…

item.title: Level Restoring
item.dc:creator: @bobbie1990 bobbie1990
item.description:
@bobbie1990 wrote:

Here is a example of the code:

if(NPCID == ID) {
playerLevel[1] = 1;
sendMessage(“Your defence level is now 1 agine.”);
PutNPCCoords = true;
}

this will happend if we just click it… but how can i make it like this:

NPC: Hello “+ playerName+” would you like to restore your defence?
Player: Yes please! or No!
NPC: Are you sure? its no way to get back…
Player: Yes or No
NPC: Ok your Defence is now 1 agine.
Player: Thank You!

This was just a exemple!
can u help me make it? and where i add this code and stuff

Read full topic
